public-private.name: Ping from public to private
public-private.pattern: [network-traffic:dst_ref.type = 'ipv4-addr' AND network-traffic:src_ref.type = 'ipv4-addr' AND network-traffic:src_ref.value = '{public_range}' AND network-traffic:dst_ref.value = '{private_range}' AND network-traffic:protocols[*] = 'icmp'
